MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G12 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Westbourne Gardens and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1.08pm. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate an underground cable fault caused by third party damage. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.59pm on the 15th October 2020.
